about_the_game:
Containing over 120 creatures, Malevolent & Benign is a must-have monster source for populating any Pathfinder game.

  • 139 Creatures
  • Organized alphabetically, by CR, by terrain, and by type.
  • Includes 4 versions of Faceless Ones.
  • Includes creature types: Abberations, Animals, Constructs, Fey, Humanoid, Magical Beasts, Monstrous Humanoids, Outsiders, Plants, Undead, and Vermin.
  • Includes 10 types of Outsiders.

Requires: A Fantasy Grounds full or ultimate license or an active subscription and the included Pathfinder ruleset (compatible with the 3.5E ruleset).
detailed_description:
Containing over 120 creatures, Malevolent & Benign is a must-have monster source for populating any Pathfinder game.

  • 139 Creatures
  • Organized alphabetically, by CR, by terrain, and by type.
  • Includes 4 versions of Faceless Ones.
  • Includes creature types: Abberations, Animals, Constructs, Fey, Humanoid, Magical Beasts, Monstrous Humanoids, Outsiders, Plants, Undead, and Vermin.
  • Includes 10 types of Outsiders.

Requires: A Fantasy Grounds full or ultimate license or an active subscription and the included Pathfinder ruleset (compatible with the 3.5E ruleset).

name: Fantasy Grounds - Malevolent & Benign (PFRPG)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
